panels.description: BPF memory usage in the entire system including components not managed by Cilium.
panels.title: System-wide BPF memory usage

panels.description: Fill percentage of BPF maps, tagged by map name
panels.title: BPF map pressure

targets.expr: avg(rate(cilium_proxy_upstream_reply_seconds_sum{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope) / sum(rate(cilium_proxy_upstream_reply_seconds_count{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope)

min(rate(cilium_triggers_policy_update_call_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope) / sum(rate(cilium_triggers_policy_update_call_duration_seconds_count{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope)

avg(rate(cilium_triggers_policy_update_call_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope) / sum(rate(cilium_triggers_policy_update_call_duration_seconds_count{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope)

max(rate(cilium_triggers_policy_update_call_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope) / sum(rate(cilium_triggers_policy_update_call_duration_seconds_count{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope)

max(rate(cilium_proxy_upstream_reply_seconds_sum{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope) / sum(rate(cilium_proxy_upstream_reply_seconds_count{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, scope)

sum(rate(cilium_controllers_runs_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, status) / sum(rate(cilium_controllers_runs_duration_seconds_count{namespace="kube-system", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, status)
sum(rate(cilium_kubernetes_events_received_total{namespace="kube-system", equal="true", valid="true", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod, scope, action)
sum(rate(cilium_kubernetes_events_received_total{namespace="kube-system", equal="true", valid="false", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod, scope, action)
sum(rate(cilium_kubernetes_events_received_total{namespace="kube-system", equal="false", valid="true", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod, scope, action, valid)
sum(rate(cilium_kubernetes_events_received_total{namespace="kube-system", equal="false", valid="false", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod, scope, action)
